thread.title: Mr Stephen Harris
thread.title_full: Uttings reviewed by Mr Stephen Harris

author: Mr Stephen Harris
title: Mr Stephen Harris
text: Excellent well laid out website; prices very competitive & a wide selection of products from boots/clothing/rifle scopes to shooting products. Excellent customer service who really do care & sort out any mistakes or problems. I do 95% of my shopping at this store been shopping here since 2009 repeat customer, recommended shop definitely.
